effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. If round has already been used this turn, this move’s power is doubled. After this move is used, any other Pokémon using it this turn will immediately do so (in the order they would otherwise act), regardless of Speed or priority. Pokémon using other moves will then continue to act as usual.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. If round has already been used this turn, this move’s power is doubled. After this move is used, any other Pokémon using it this turn will immediately do so (in the order they would otherwise act), regardless of Speed or priority. Pokémon using other moves will then continue to act as usual.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. If round has already been used this turn, this move’s power is doubled. After this move is used, any other Pokémon using it this turn will immediately do so (in the order they would otherwise act), regardless of Speed or priority. Pokémon using other moves will then continue to act as usual.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Has double power if it’s used more than once per turn.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Has double power if it’s used more than once per turn.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Has double power if it’s used more than once per turn.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user attacks the target with a song. If others use this move, they will act immediately after the initial user, and the power of their Rounds will be boosted.
